author: dims
msg: Fix for WSFX-20 - The reply (forwarded message) requires a bit more configurability
Fix for WSFX-16 - AddressingHandler.forwardMessage() doesn't use the headers as configured by the response process.

author: gawor
msg: another way to deal with replicated headers - sovles the multiple RelatesTo headers problem, and improved how RelatesTo defines new namespaces

author: dims
msg: Fix for WSFX-14 - Allow From, ReplyTo, and FaultTo addresses to be set via context properties
Fix for WSFX-15 - Add actor support to the AddressingHandler

author: gawor
msg: added util functions to get input/output actions based on wsdl, made functions protected in handler to allow overriding
